FlowDefinition.description: - Sends Platform Event for either Customer or Prospect if Grace-relevant data has been changed by anyone other than the Integration User - Adds and removes KAM and LAM to the Account Team if one of them has been changed - Sends out Notification to Owner and Account Team if relevant data has been changed. If the KAM or LAM has been changed during this update, the old KAM or LAM will be informed as well.
